FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'd rather be his whore\r\nthan your wife!

Block.PlainText: Help me! Can anybody hear me!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Help me! Can anybody hear me!

Block.PlainText: Madam, please, put on a lifebelt.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Madam, please, put on a lifebelt.

Block.PlainText: Lucy, for God's sake, put on\r\nyour lifebelt. Set a good example.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Lucy, for God's sake, put on\r\nyour lifebelt. Set a good example.

Block.PlainText: Mr. Andrews, thank God! Where would\r\nthey take someone under arrest?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Mr. Andrews, thank God! Where would\r\nthey take someone under arrest?

Block.PlainText: You have to get to a boat right away.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You have to get to a boat right away.

Block.PlainText: I'm doing this with or without your help,\r\nbut without will take longer.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm doing this with or without your help,\r\nbut without will take longer.

Block.PlainText: Take the elevator to the very bottom.\r\nGo left down the crewmen's passage.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Take the elevator to the very bottom.\r\nGo left down the crewmen's passage.

Block.PlainText: Go right and left again at the stairs.\r\nYou’ll come to a corridor.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Go right and left again at the stairs.\r\nYou’ll come to a corridor.

Block.PlainText: - (Crewman) The lifts are closed.\r\n- I do not care...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - (Crewman) The lifts are closed.\r\n- I do not care...

Block.PlainText: I'm sorry, miss,\r\nbut the lifts are closed.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm sorry, miss,\r\nbut the lifts are closed.

Block.PlainText: I'm through being polite,\r\ngoddamn it! Now take me down!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm through being polite,\r\ngoddamn it! Now take me down!

Block.PlainText: Come on... Come on, come on...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come on... Come on, come on...

Block.PlainText: Come back! I'm going back up!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come back! I'm going back up!

Block.PlainText: - Lovejoy put it in my pocket.\r\n- I know! I know, I know, I know!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Lovejoy put it in my pocket.\r\n- I know! I know, I know, I know!

Block.PlainText: Rose, you have to find\r\na spare key, all right?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Rose, you have to find\r\na spare key, all right?

Block.PlainText: It's a little silver one, Rose.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's a little silver one, Rose.

Block.PlainText: How did you find out I didn't do it?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: How did you find out I didn't do it?

Block.PlainText: I just realised I already knew.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I just realised I already knew.

Block.PlainText: You have to go find help.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You have to go find help.

Block.PlainText: Can anybody hear me! Please!\r\nHello! Hello!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Can anybody hear me! Please!\r\nHello! Hello!

Block.PlainText: I need your help. There's a man\r\nback here and... Wait!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I need your help. There's a man\r\nback here and... Wait!

Block.PlainText: - Miss, you shouldn’t be here now.\r\n- Please, I need your help.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Miss, you shouldn’t be here now.\r\n- Please, I need your help.

Block.PlainText: There is a man down here\r\nand he is trapped!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: There is a man down here\r\nand he is trapped!

Block.PlainText: - No need to panic.\r\n- I'm not panicking!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - No need to panic.\r\n- I'm not panicking!

Block.PlainText: You're going the wrong way!\r\nlet go of me! Listen!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You're going the wrong way!\r\nlet go of me! Listen!

Block.PlainText: I guess we'll find out. Come on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I guess we'll find out. Come on.

Block.PlainText: Good. Try to hit the same mark\r\nagain, Rose. You can do it.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Good. Try to hit the same mark\r\nagain, Rose. You can do it.

Block.PlainText: Come on, Rose. You can do it.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come on, Rose. You can do it.

Block.PlainText: Listen, just hit it really hard\r\nand really fast.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Listen, just hit it really hard\r\nand really fast.

Block.PlainText: Wait! Open your hands up\r\na little more.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Wait! Open your hands up\r\na little more.

Block.PlainText: Oh, shit, this is cold! Oh, shit!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Oh, shit, this is cold! Oh, shit!

Block.PlainText: We have to find another way. Come on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We have to find another way. Come on.

Block.PlainText: Put your backs into it! Pull!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Put your backs into it! Pull!

Block.PlainText: Now there's something\r\nyou don't see every day.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Now there's something\r\nyou don't see every day.

Block.PlainText: What's this luggage doing here?\r\nGet rid of it! We need the room!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: What's this luggage doing here?\r\nGet rid of it! We need the room!

Block.PlainText: Move along there. Make more room.\r\nThat's right. look sharp.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Move along there. Make more room.\r\nThat's right. look sharp.

Block.PlainText: - Lovejoy!\r\n- She's not on the starboard side.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Lovejoy!\r\n- She's not on the starboard side.

Block.PlainText: We're running out of time and this\r\nmartinet isn't letting any men on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We're running out of time and this\r\nmartinet isn't letting any men on.

Block.PlainText: There's one on the other side\r\nletting men on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: There's one on the other side\r\nletting men on.

Block.PlainText: Then that's our play. We’ll need\r\nsome insurance first. Come on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Then that's our play. We’ll need\r\nsome insurance first. Come on.

Block.PlainText: This way. All the way down here.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: This way. All the way down here.

Block.PlainText: Here! What do you think you're doing?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Here! What do you think you're doing?

Block.PlainText: You’ll have to pay for that!\r\nThat's White Star line property!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You’ll have to pay for that!\r\nThat's White Star line property!

Block.PlainText: Will you hold the boat a moment?\r\nI just have to run back to my room...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Will you hold the boat a moment?\r\nI just have to run back to my room...

Block.PlainText: Mr. Lightoller, why are the boats\r\nbeing launched half full?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Mr. Lightoller, why are the boats\r\nbeing launched half full?

Block.PlainText: - Not now, Mr. Andrews.\r\n- 20 or so in a boat built for 65...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Not now, Mr. Andrews.\r\n- 20 or so in a boat built for 65...

Block.PlainText: ...and I saw one boat with only 12! 12!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...and I saw one boat with only 12! 12!

Block.PlainText: We weren't sure of the weight,\r\nMr. Andrews. These boats may buckle.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We weren't sure of the weight,\r\nMr. Andrews. These boats may buckle.

Block.PlainText: They were tested in Belfast\r\nwith 70 men!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: They were tested in Belfast\r\nwith 70 men!

Block.PlainText: Now fill these boats, Mr. Lightoller,\r\nfor God's sake, man!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Now fill these boats, Mr. Lightoller,\r\nfor God's sake, man!

Block.PlainText: I need more women and children, please!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I need more women and children, please!

Block.PlainText: (Crewman) Get back in there.\r\nThis is not an exit.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: (Crewman) Get back in there.\r\nThis is not an exit.

Block.PlainText: - Get back in there.\r\n- This is not an exit!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Get back in there.\r\n- This is not an exit!

Block.PlainText: You can't keep us locked in here!\r\nThe ship's bloody sinking!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You can't keep us locked in here!\r\nThe ship's bloody sinking!

Block.PlainText: Get them back from those gates!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Get them back from those gates!

Block.PlainText: There are women and children\r\ndown here!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: There are women and children\r\ndown here!

Block.PlainText: let us up so we can have a chance!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: let us up so we can have a chance!

Block.PlainText: - Can we get out?\r\n- It's hopeless that way!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Can we get out?\r\n- It's hopeless that way!

Block.PlainText: Whatever we do,\r\nwe've gotta do it fast.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Whatever we do,\r\nwe've gotta do it fast.

Block.PlainText: - This whole place is flooding.\r\n- There is niente this way.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - This whole place is flooding.\r\n- There is niente this way.

Block.PlainText: All right. let’s go this way. Come on.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: All right. let’s go this way. Come on.

Block.PlainText: No, come on. let’s go this way.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: No, come on. let’s go this way.

Block.PlainText: Go back to the main stairwell\r\nand everything will be sorted out there.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Go back to the main stairwell\r\nand everything will be sorted out there.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It will get sorted out back there.

Block.PlainText: Go back to the main stairwell.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Go back to the main stairwell.

Block.PlainText: - Open the gate now!\r\n- Go back down the main stairwell!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Open the gate now!\r\n- Go back down the main stairwell!

Block.PlainText: Goddamn it! Son of a bitch!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Goddamn it! Son of a bitch!

Block.PlainText: - Fabri, Tommy. Give me a hand here!\r\n- Move aside! Move aside!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Fabri, Tommy. Give me a hand here!\r\n- Move aside! Move aside!

Block.PlainText: You can't go up there!\r\nYou can't do this!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You can't go up there!\r\nYou can't do this!

Block.PlainText: Or I'll shoot you all like dogs!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Or I'll shoot you all like dogs!

Block.PlainText: - We're too late.\r\n- There are more boats at the front.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - We're too late.\r\n- There are more boats at the front.

Block.PlainText: Stay with this one.\r\nMurdoch seems to be quite practical.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Stay with this one.\r\nMurdoch seems to be quite practical.

Block.PlainText: Stay back! Stay back,\r\nthe lot of you! Stay back!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Stay back! Stay back,\r\nthe lot of you! Stay back!

Block.PlainText: It's starting to fall apart.\r\nWe don't have much time.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's starting to fall apart.\r\nWe don't have much time.

Block.PlainText: I'm a businessman, as you know,\r\nand I've a business proposition for you.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm a businessman, as you know,\r\nand I've a business proposition for you.

Block.PlainText: Colonel, are there any boats\r\non that side?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Colonel, are there any boats\r\non that side?

Block.PlainText: No, miss, but there are a couple\r\nof boats all the way forward.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: No, miss, but there are a couple\r\nof boats all the way forward.

Block.PlainText: What's the use?\r\nNobody's listening to us, anyway.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: What's the use?\r\nNobody's listening to us, anyway.

Block.PlainText: They don't Listen to us at dinner, either.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: They don't Listen to us at dinner, either.

Block.PlainText: Come on, let’s play. Keep us warm.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come on, let’s play. Keep us warm.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: (playing fast music from\r\n''Orpheus In The Underworld'')

Block.PlainText: Music to drown by.\r\nNow I know I'm in first class!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Music to drown by.\r\nNow I know I'm in first class!

Block.PlainText: - Where is everyone?\r\n- They're all still aft, sir.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Where is everyone?\r\n- They're all still aft, sir.

Block.PlainText: We have an understanding, then,\r\nMr. Murdoch?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We have an understanding, then,\r\nMr. Murdoch?

Block.PlainText: Come through, madam.\r\nThis way. Step back, sir.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come through, madam.\r\nThis way. Step back, sir.

Block.PlainText: You better check the other side.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You better check the other side.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I found her on the other side\r\nwaiting for a boat.

Block.PlainText: - Any more women and children?\r\n- They're all aboard.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Any more women and children?\r\n- They're all aboard.

Block.PlainText: It'll be fine, darling.\r\nDon't you worry.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It'll be fine, darling.\r\nDon't you worry.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's goodbye for a little while.\r\nOnly a little while.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: There's another boat for daddies.\r\nThis one's for mummies and children.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Hold mummy's hand and be a good girl.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - I'm not going without you.\r\n- You have to... Now!

Block.PlainText: - Get in the boat, Rose.\r\n- No, Jack.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Get in the boat, Rose.\r\n- No, Jack.

Block.PlainText: Yes, get on the boat, Rose.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Yes, get on the boat, Rose.

Block.PlainText: My God, look at you.\r\nYou look a fright!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: My God, look at you.\r\nYou look a fright!

Block.PlainText: - Go on. I'll get the next one.\r\n- No! Not without you!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Go on. I'll get the next one.\r\n- No! Not without you!

Block.PlainText: I'll be fine. I'm a survivor, all right?\r\nDon't worry about me.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'll be fine. I'm a survivor, all right?\r\nDon't worry about me.

Block.PlainText: I have an arrangement\r\nwith an officer on the ship.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I have an arrangement\r\nwith an officer on the ship.

Block.PlainText: Jack and I can get off safely.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Jack and I can get off safely.

Block.PlainText: - Got my own boat to catch.\r\n- Hurry!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Got my own boat to catch.\r\n- Hurry!

Block.PlainText: There's no, uh...\r\nThere's no arrangement, is there?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: There's no, uh...\r\nThere's no arrangement, is there?

Block.PlainText: Not that you'll benefit much from it.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Not that you'll benefit much from it.

Block.PlainText: - Stop her!\r\n- What are you doing!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Stop her!\r\n- What are you doing!

Block.PlainText: You're so stupid! Why'd you do that?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You're so stupid! Why'd you do that?

Block.PlainText: Why did you do that? Why?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Why did you do that? Why?

Block.PlainText: It's all right.\r\nWe’ll think of something.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's all right.\r\nWe’ll think of something.

Block.PlainText: I hope you enjoy your time together!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I hope you enjoy your time together!

Block.PlainText: I put the diamond in the coat...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I put the diamond in the coat...

Block.PlainText: ...and I put the coat on her!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...and I put the coat on her!

Block.PlainText: It's the wrong way! Come back!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's the wrong way! Come back!

Block.PlainText: - Wait, sir! Open the gate, please!\r\n- Help us, please!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Wait, sir! Open the gate, please!\r\n- Help us, please!

Block.PlainText: I'm sorry, I dropped the keys!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm sorry, I dropped the keys!

Block.PlainText: Don't leave! Please! Get more help!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Don't leave! Please! Get more help!

Block.PlainText: I got 'em! Which one is it, Rose?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I got 'em! Which one is it, Rose?

Block.PlainText: The sharp one, try the sharp one.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: The sharp one, try the sharp one.

Block.PlainText: I got it! I got it! Go! Go, Rose!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I got it! I got it! Go! Go, Rose!

Block.PlainText: Oars in place! Get an oar under it!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Oars in place! Get an oar under it!

Block.PlainText: Women and children only, damn you!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Women and children only, damn you!

Block.PlainText: Get these davits cranked in!\r\nThen get the falls hooked up!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Get these davits cranked in!\r\nThen get the falls hooked up!

Block.PlainText: Give us a chance to live,\r\nyou limey bastard!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Give us a chance to live,\r\nyou limey bastard!

Block.PlainText: I'll shoot any man\r\nwho tries to get past me!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'll shoot any man\r\nwho tries to get past me!

Block.PlainText: We had a deal, damn you.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We had a deal, damn you.

Block.PlainText: Your money can't save you\r\nany more than it can save me.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Your money can't save you\r\nany more than it can save me.

Block.PlainText: - I have a child!\r\n- Clear a path here!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - I have a child!\r\n- Clear a path here!

Block.PlainText: Please, I'm all she has in the world.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Please, I'm all she has in the world.

Block.PlainText: Won't you even make a try for it?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Won't you even make a try for it?

Block.PlainText: I'm sorry that I didn't build you\r\na stronger ship, young Rose.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I'm sorry that I didn't build you\r\na stronger ship, young Rose.

Block.PlainText: Mr. Guggenheim...\r\nThese are for you, Mr. Guggenheim.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Mr. Guggenheim...\r\nThese are for you, Mr. Guggenheim.

Block.PlainText: We are dressed in our best and\r\nare prepared to go down as gentlemen.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We are dressed in our best and\r\nare prepared to go down as gentlemen.

Block.PlainText: But we would like a brandy.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: But we would like a brandy.

Block.PlainText: And so they lived happily together\r\nfor 300 years...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: And so they lived happily together\r\nfor 300 years...

Block.PlainText: ...in the land of Tir Na Nog.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...in the land of Tir Na Nog.

Block.PlainText: land of eternal youth and beauty.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: land of eternal youth and beauty.

Block.PlainText: Cut those falls!\r\nCut 'em! Cut 'em if you have to!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Cut those falls!\r\nCut 'em! Cut 'em if you have to!

Block.PlainText: I need a knife! I need a knife!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I need a knife! I need a knife!

Block.PlainText: Gentlemen, it has been a privilege\r\nplaying with you tonight.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Gentlemen, it has been a privilege\r\nplaying with you tonight.

Block.PlainText: We have to stay on the ship\r\nas long as possible! Come on!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We have to stay on the ship\r\nas long as possible! Come on!

Block.PlainText: Though I walk through\r\nthe valley of the shadow of death...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Though I walk through\r\nthe valley of the shadow of death...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You wanna walk a little faster\r\nthrough that valley?!

Block.PlainText: ...pray for us sinners now\r\nand at the hour of our death. Amen.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...pray for us sinners now\r\nand at the hour of our death. Amen.

Block.PlainText: I saw a new heaven and a new earth...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I saw a new heaven and a new earth...

Block.PlainText: ...when the first heaven and\r\nthe first earth had passed away...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...when the first heaven and\r\nthe first earth had passed away...

Block.PlainText: It'll be over soon.\r\nIt'll all be over soon.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It'll be over soon.\r\nIt'll all be over soon.

Block.PlainText: And he shall dwell with them\r\nand they shall be his people...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: And he shall dwell with them\r\nand they shall be his people...

Block.PlainText: ...and God himself shall be with them.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...and God himself shall be with them.

Block.PlainText: And God shall wipe away\r\nall the tears from their eyes.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: And God shall wipe away\r\nall the tears from their eyes.

Block.PlainText: And there shall be no more death.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: And there shall be no more death.

Block.PlainText: Neither shall there be sorrow or crying.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Neither shall there be sorrow or crying.

Block.PlainText: Neither shall there be\r\nany more pain...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Neither shall there be\r\nany more pain...

Block.PlainText: ...for the former world has passed away.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...for the former world has passed away.

Block.PlainText: Give me your hand.\r\nI'll pull you over.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Give me your hand.\r\nI'll pull you over.

Block.PlainText: I've got you. I won't let go.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I've got you. I won't let go.

Block.PlainText: - What's happening, Jack?\r\n- I don't know!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - What's happening, Jack?\r\n- I don't know!

Block.PlainText: The ship is gonna suck us down.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: The ship is gonna suck us down.

Block.PlainText: Take a deep breath when I say.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Take a deep breath when I say.

Block.PlainText: Kick for the surface\r\nand keep kicking.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Kick for the surface\r\nand keep kicking.

Block.PlainText: Do not let go of my hand.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Do not let go of my hand.

Block.PlainText: We're gonna make it, Rose. Trust me.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We're gonna make it, Rose. Trust me.

Block.PlainText: Get off her! Get off her!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Get off her! Get off her!

Block.PlainText: Swim, Rose! I need you to swim!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Swim, Rose! I need you to swim!

Block.PlainText: The boats are coming back for us, Rose.\r\nHold on just a bit longer.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: The boats are coming back for us, Rose.\r\nHold on just a bit longer.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: They... had to row away\r\nfrom the suction...

Block.PlainText: - For God's sake!\r\n- Please! Help us!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - For God's sake!\r\n- Please! Help us!

Block.PlainText: You don't understand. If we go back,\r\nthey'll swamp the boat!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You don't understand. If we go back,\r\nthey'll swamp the boat!

Block.PlainText: Come on, girls, grab an oar.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Come on, girls, grab an oar.

Block.PlainText: Are you mad?! We're in the middle\r\nof the North Atlantic!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Are you mad?! We're in the middle\r\nof the North Atlantic!

Block.PlainText: Do you people want to live\r\nor do you want to die!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Do you people want to live\r\nor do you want to die!

Block.PlainText: I don't understand a one of you.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I don't understand a one of you.

Block.PlainText: - There's plenty of room for more.\r\n- There'll be one less on this boat...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - There's plenty of room for more.\r\n- There'll be one less on this boat...

Block.PlainText: ...if you don't shut that hole\r\nin your face!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...if you don't shut that hole\r\nin your face!

Block.PlainText: Bring in your oars over there.\r\nTie these two boats together as well.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Bring in your oars over there.\r\nTie these two boats together as well.

Block.PlainText: Now make sure that's tied up\r\nnice and tight.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Now make sure that's tied up\r\nnice and tight.

Block.PlainText: Listen to me, men,\r\nwe have to go back.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Listen to me, men,\r\nwe have to go back.

Block.PlainText: I want to transfer all the women\r\nfrom this boat into that boat.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I want to transfer all the women\r\nfrom this boat into that boat.

Block.PlainText: It's just gonna take 'em\r\na couple of minutes to get...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: It's just gonna take 'em\r\na couple of minutes to get...

Block.PlainText: I don't know about you, but...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I don't know about you, but...

Block.PlainText: ...I intend to write a strongly worded letter\r\nto the White Star line...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...I intend to write a strongly worded letter\r\nto the White Star line...

Block.PlainText: Don't you say your goodbyes. Not yet.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Don't you say your goodbyes. Not yet.

Block.PlainText: You're gonna get out of here.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You're gonna get out of here.

Block.PlainText: You're gonna go on, and you're\r\ngonna make lots of babies,...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You're gonna go on, and you're\r\ngonna make lots of babies,...

Block.PlainText: ...an old lady warm in her bed.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...an old lady warm in her bed.

Block.PlainText: Not this night. Not like this.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Not this night. Not like this.

Block.PlainText: Winning that ticket was the best thing\r\nthat ever happened to me.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Winning that ticket was the best thing\r\nthat ever happened to me.

Block.PlainText: You must do me this honour...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You must do me this honour...

Block.PlainText: You must promise me\r\nthat you'll survive,...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: You must promise me\r\nthat you'll survive,...

Block.PlainText: ...and never let go of that promise.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...and never let go of that promise.

Block.PlainText: I will never let go, Jack.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: I will never let go, Jack.

Block.PlainText: Is there anyone alive out there!

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Is there anyone alive out there!

Block.PlainText: Is there anyone alive out there!

Block.PlainText: 1,500 people went into the sea\r\nwhen Titanic sank from under us.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: 1,500 people went into the sea\r\nwhen Titanic sank from under us.

Block.PlainText: Six were saved from the water,...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Six were saved from the water,...

Block.PlainText: ...the 700 people in the boats\r\nhad nothing to do but wait.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...the 700 people in the boats\r\nhad nothing to do but wait.

Block.PlainText: Wait to die, wait to live...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Wait to die, wait to live...

Block.PlainText: Sir, I don't think you'll find\r\nany of your people down here.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Sir, I don't think you'll find\r\nany of your people down here.

Block.PlainText: (Woman) His hair is reddish brown.\r\nReddish brown and a white beard.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: (Woman) His hair is reddish brown.\r\nReddish brown and a white beard.

Block.PlainText: - Is there another passenger list?\r\n- There's no other list.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: - Perhaps he's on another ship.\r\n- We're doing all we can, ma'am.

Block.PlainText: (Rose)\r\nThat's the last time I ever saw him.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: (Rose)\r\nThat's the last time I ever saw him.

Block.PlainText: He married, of course,\r\nand inherited his millions.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: He married, of course,\r\nand inherited his millions.

Block.PlainText: But the crash of '29\r\nhit his interests hard...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: But the crash of '29\r\nhit his interests hard...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: ...and he put a pistol\r\nin his mouth that year.

Block.PlainText: Can I take your name, please, love?

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: Can I take your name, please, love?

Block.PlainText: We never found anything on Jack.\r\nThere's no record of him at all.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: We never found anything on Jack.\r\nThere's no record of him at all.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: No, there wouldn’t be, would there?

Block.PlainText: And I've never spoken of him until now.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: And I've never spoken of him until now.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: A woman's heart\r\nis a deep ocean of secrets.

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: But now you know there was\r\na man named Jack Dawson...

FormattedTexts.FormattedText: In every way that a person can be saved.
